page.title: 03SPORTS IN BEDFORD
page.content: If you are a tennis fan there are courts at Bedford park and Russel Park. Clubs are River Side Lawn Tennis Club and Bedford Tennis Club. Both have a club house, coaches, leagues, tournaments and competions all year round for ladies, men and children. The River is used by the Town and Star rowing clubs and they are very busy all year round. If you are interested in canoeing Viking Canoeing Club might interest you. You can canoe on the river and you can sail on Priory Lake. In Bedford, football is a very popular sport with league and cup competions. If you are into Rugby B.R.F.U.C. at Goldington Road play the top clubs. It was formed in 1886.Their colours are dark blue and light blue hoops. There is a junior section of the club for 6 to 13 year olds. Swimmers can try Robinson Pool.
